728635f-a.title: Richmond: Canal Street - Wright Street
728635f-a.text:
139 Canal Street, adjoining the S.W. corner of
Wright Street, showing the Park Theatre.
March 23, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

728642f-a.title: Richmond: Canal Street - Wright Street
728642f-a.text:
Canal Street, adjoining and south of (right to left) the S.W.
corner of Wright Street (Stapleton). Adjoining the corner is the
Rex Theatre.
October 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728642f-a.folder: Canal Street & Wright Street, Staten Island, NY

728638f-a.text:

March 23, 1930
P. A. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

729961f-a.title: Richmond: Wright Street - Canal Street
729961f-a.text:
Wright Street, east side, between Canal and Water
Streets, showing the Stapleton Police Court.

P. L. Sperr
